glsa.title: xine-lib: Format string vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: xine-lib contains a format string error in CDDB response handling that may be exploited to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: xine-lib is a multimedia library which can be utilized to create multimedia frontends. It includes functions to retrieve information about audio CD contents from public CDDB servers.

description.p: Ulf Harnhammar discovered a format string bug in the routines handling CDDB server response contents.

impact.p: An attacker could submit malicious information about an audio CD to a public CDDB server (or impersonate a public CDDB server). When the victim plays this CD on a multimedia frontend relying on xine-lib, it could end up executing arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
